name: The Spectators
description:
It is 1560. There are no secrets in the iron-willed Duke d'Este's marriage to his young bride, a girl unprepared for her new role as Duchess. The Duke's army of servants are always present, always watching, and always under his control.

Cover art by Alessandro Allori, circa 1560, banner art made with Canva.

Play time about 4 hours.

Content warnings: Violence, death, mild sexual situations, scatalogical language, mentions of rape and domestic abuse.
